entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
